original: de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //üîΩde lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o // de lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩwe will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //üîΩde lta de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o // de lta de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of what is not beyond extremes.üîΩwe will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of what is not rejected.

original: de lta de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of all things.

original: de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //üîΩde lta de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o // de lta de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: in the same way, we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of non-apprehension.üîΩin the same way, we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩin the same way, we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of own-marks.

original: de lta de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //üîΩde lta de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @146a *//
analyzed: de lta de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o // de lta de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @146a *//
translated: in the same way, we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: in the same way, we will instruct and teach them in the emptiness of the existence of other.

original: de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: in the same way, we will instruct and teach the Bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o; ;dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o; ;dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: we will instruct and teach them in the legs of supernatural power. we will instruct and teach them in the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the formless meditative stabilizations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.üîΩ

original: mngon @146b bar shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //üîΩting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mngon @146b bar shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o // ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.üîΩI will instruct and teach them the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions, the four limbs of miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the three gateways to liberation, the four noble truths, the four formless absorptions, the five higher cognitions, the eight aspects of liberation, and the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o //üîΩmi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan bar bgyi'o // mi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four kinds of intrepid confidence, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, and great compassion.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them the thirty-two major marks of a great being, the eighty minor marks, the four forms of purity related to the retinue, the four forms of purity related to the domain, the four forms of correct knowledge, the six forms of complete recall, the four forms of fearlessness, the three closely placed recollections, and the three forms of steadfastness.

original: byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them great love, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity.

original: snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them in the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste /üîΩbyang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi /
analyzed: gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste / byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi /
translated: I will also support them with robes, alms-food, bedding and seats, and medicines for the sick.üîΩThose sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who look after those bodhisattva great beings with the Dharma and with material things will generate much merit.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni /
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who look after those bodhisattva great beings with the Dharma and with material things will generate much merit.

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: No, Blessed One, they will not.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩbcom ldan 'das /üîΩde ni / yong yang de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / bcom ldan 'das / de ni / yong yang de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Blessed One, why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni /
translated: Blessed One, it is because those bodhisattva great beingsüîΩare the very ones who will attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @147a *//üîΩgdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @147a *// gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the perfection of moral discipline,üîΩthe perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the perfection of meditative concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩnang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe instructed and taught them about inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: and the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the great,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate,üîΩthe emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das ba stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das ba stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,üîΩthe emptiness of beginning and end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of non-rejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams @147b shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams @147b shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: and the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.

original: mi dmigs ba stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs ba stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong ba nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩHe instructs and teaches them about the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o; ;stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o; ;stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the faculties. He instructs and teaches them about the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: He instructs and teaches them about the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //

original: 'phags pa'i ba dan pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i ba dan pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the noble banner.

original: bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //

original: tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa @148a *//üîΩla gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa @148a *// la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the nine serial absorptions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to liberation.üîΩthe clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩbyams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges;üîΩgreat love;

original: snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //üîΩde nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Then venerable Subh≈´ti said to ≈öatakratu, head of the gods, ‚ÄúKau≈õika,üîΩit is excellent, excellent,

original: khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so; ;legs so //
analyzed: khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so; ;legs so //
translated: that you have aroused such an aspiration for the bodhisattvas, that you have helped the bodhisattvas and protected them.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kau≈õika,

original: khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin /

original: gzugs dang / tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin /

analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin /

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri @156b dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri @156b dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang de bzhin /

original: khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'ang de bzhin /üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'ang de bzhin / nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin /

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid de'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid @166b de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the emptiness of nonrepudiation,üîΩbut they apprehend the emptiness of nonrepudiation in terms of nonapprehending and in terms of signlessness.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / @167a *//

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
translated: but they apprehend that emptiness of defining characteristics by way of nonapprehension and by way of signlessness.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing /

original: yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
translated: but they do so without apprehending those right efforts, and they do so by way of the absence of attributes.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod @167b cing /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod @167b cing /

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: dbang po rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod cing /

original: dbang po de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: dbang po de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: stobs rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: stobs rnams la spyod cing /

original: stobs de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: stobs de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the concentrations,

original: bsam gtan de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyod cing /

analyzed: tshad med pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul @168a *//
translated: ‚ÄúThey practice the formless absorptions,üîΩbut they do so without apprehending the formless absorptions,

analyzed: dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing /

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyod cing /

original: mngon par shes pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing /

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /

translated: They practice the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,üîΩand they apprehend those eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha by way of nonapprehension and by way of signlessness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
translated: They apprehend the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas in a manner of non-apprehension and in a manner of signlessness.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the knowledge of all phenomenaüîΩand apprehend the knowledge of all phenomena in a manner of non-apprehension and in a manner of signlessness.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the knowledge of the aspects of the path

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed /
translated: and apprehend the knowledge of the aspects of the path in a manner of non-apprehension and in a manner of signlessness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the knowledge of all aspects

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na /
translated: and apprehend the knowledge of all aspects in a manner of non-apprehension and in a manner of signlessness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol @169a *//
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol @169a *//
translated: If they practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

original: tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang /üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: They have great interest in the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience,üîΩthe perfection of ethical discipline, and the perfection of generosity. They have great interest in inner emptiness, outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: They are devoted to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, devoted to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, devoted to the emptiness of what transcends limits, devoted to the emptiness of the beginning and end,üîΩdevoted to the emptiness of non-rejection, devoted to the emptiness of inherent existence, devoted to the emptiness of all phenomena, devoted to the emptiness of its own mark,

original: mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / @169b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / @169b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: devoted to the emptiness of non-apprehension, devoted to the emptiness of non-entities, devoted to the emptiness of essential nature, and devoted to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / dbang po rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /üîΩstobs rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / dbang po rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / stobs rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: They have great interest in the applications of mindfulness, great interest in the right efforts, great interest in the legs of miraculous power, great interest in the faculties,üîΩgreat interest in the powers, great interest in the branches of awakening, great interest in the noble eightfold path, great interest in the noble truths, great interest in the meditative stabilizations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: great interest in the immeasurables, great interest in the formless absorptions, great interest in the eight deliverances, great interest in the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /
translated: They will have much interest in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation. They will have much interest in the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos pa mang ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang /üîΩsnying rje chen po la mos pa mang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos @170a *//
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos pa mang ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / snying rje chen po la mos pa mang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos @170a *//
translated: the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha. They will have much interest in the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //üîΩdge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro // dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan /
translated: They will be taken care of by spiritual friends.

original: yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te /üîΩde'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te / de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: Those spiritual friends will teach them the six perfections, both in their meaning and in their verbal expression.üîΩThey will teach them so that they will not be separated from the perfection of wisdom until they have entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: They will teach them so that they will not be separated from the perfection of concentration until they have entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med bar chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tuüîΩphyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med bar chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches so that they will not be separated from the perfection of patience until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.üîΩHe teaches so that they will not be separated from the perfection of morality until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang sbyin @170b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang sbyin @170b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches so that they will not be separated from the perfection of generosity until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyurüîΩba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: they teach in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of external phenomena until they have entered the secure state of bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: they teach in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of external and internal phenomena until they have entered the secure state of bodhisattvas;üîΩthey teach in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of emptiness until they have entered the secure state of bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to //
translated: they teach in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of great extent until they have entered the secure state of bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur bde ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them the Dharma in such a way that, until they have entered the secure state of a Bodhisattva, they will not be separated from the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩHe teaches them the Dharma in such a way that, until they have entered the secure state of a Bodhisattva, they will not be separated from the emptiness of the compounded.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them the Dharma in such a way that, until they have entered the secure state of a Bodhisattva, they will not be separated from the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems @171a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems @171a *//
translated: He teaches them the Dharma in such a way that, until they have entered the secure state of a Bodhisattva, they will not be separated from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them the Dharma in such a way that, until they have entered the secure state of a Bodhisattva, they will not be separated from the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness that is not rejected until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of essential nature until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.üîΩHe teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of all phenomena until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of specific characteristics until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of nonapprehension until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of non-existence until they have entered into the certainty of enlightenment.üîΩHe teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of own-being until they have entered into the certainty of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the emptiness of non-existence of own-being until they have entered into the certainty of enlightenment.

original: byang @171b chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang @171b chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them in such a way that they will not be separated from the four stations of mindfulness until they have entered into the certainty of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them so that they will not be separated from the four right efforts until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dbang po lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dbang po lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them so that they will not be separated from the four legs of psychic power until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.üîΩHe teaches them so that they will not be separated from the five faculties until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang stobs lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang stobs lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to /
translated: He teaches them so that they will not be separated from the five powers until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to //
translated: He teaches them so that they will not be separated from the seven factors of enlightenment until they have entered into the secure state of bodhisattvas.

translated: They know the right efforts to be void.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes /üîΩdbang po rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes / dbang po rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the legs of miraculous power to be void.üîΩThey know the faculties to be void.

original: stobs rnams kyis dben par shes /üîΩbyang chub kyi yan lag rnams @177a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis dben par shes / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams @177a *//
translated: They know the powers to be void.

original: kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the branches of enlightenment to be void.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes /
translated: They know the noble eightfold path to be void.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the noble truths to be void.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the concentrations to be void.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the immeasurables to be void.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the formless absorptions to be void.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis dben par shes /
translated: They know the eight deliverances to be void.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus dben par shes /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus dben par shes /
translated: They know the nine serial absorptions to be void.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas dben par shes /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas dben par shes /
translated: and that the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation are empty,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: that the clairvoyances are empty,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: that the meditative stabilizations are empty,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes /
translated: that the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways are empty,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus dben par shes /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus dben par shes /
translated: that the ten tathƒÅgata powers are empty,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhis dben par shes /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhis dben par shes /
translated: that the four fearlessnesses are empty,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis dben par shes /üîΩbyams pa chen pos dben par shes /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis dben par shes / byams pa chen pos dben par shes /
translated: that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty,üîΩthat great love is empty,

original: snying rje chen pos dben par shes /
analyzed: snying rje chen pos dben par shes /
translated: that great compassion is empty,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyis dben par shes na /üîΩrab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyis dben par shes na / rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de /
translated: and that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty,üîΩthen, Subh≈´ti, the bodhisattva great beings‚Äô

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no //
translated: making of the thing to be done that consists in merit is dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems @177b dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems @177b dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de /
translated: If a bodhisattva great being, knowing that the wholesome action of rejoicing and dedication is empty of the nature of the wholesome action of rejoicing and dedication,

original: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te //üîΩsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni /
translated: were to dedicate that wholesome action of rejoicing and dedication to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,üîΩthen that wholesome action of rejoicing and dedication would be a wholesome action of rejoicing and dedication that is not small.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni / dge ba'i rtsa pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: The blessed buddhas are empty of the nature of buddhas.üîΩThose wholesome roots are empty of the nature of wholesome roots.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni /üîΩmngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems de ni /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni / mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // byang chub kyi sems de ni /
translated: Those deeds are empty of the nature of deeds.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;yongs su bsngo ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;yongs su bsngo ba ni /
translated: That thought of awakening is empty of the nature of the thought of awakening.

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: The dedication is empty of the nature of dedication.

original: byang chub ni /
analyzed: byang chub ni /
translated: Awakening is empty of the nature of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: enlightenment is isolated from the intrinsic nature of enlightenment.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of concentration

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of concentration.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of perseverance

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of patience

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of patience.üîΩThe perfection of morality

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of morality.
